WRITING.TITLE: Keegan to appear on Friday's ALL NEW (and Guestless) "Whose Line is it Anyway?"

WRITING.TEXT:
Last Season's Guestless eps were beyond awesome! In those eps we've gotten
* One of the most classic Party Quirk moments * Pretty awesome Hoedown about turning 18 * The return of the game "Whose Line" * Got to see how awesome Gary is at "Greatest Hits" * The return of the game "Film Dub" * The return of the game "Award Show" * Ryan and Aisha fooling around in Scenes From a Hat * More of World's Worst
Those being just a couple of the highlights!
Its dwindling down a little bit! Last Season had quite a few guestless eps, as will this Season. Guest Segments have dwindled from 4 to at least two, and on some rare occasions three.
Keegan-Michael Key's the fourth seater. But other than that, no guest appearance this episode!
